subject: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY:
body:
ATTENTION BENEFICIARY:
This is to notify all our clients about the latest development concerning
all the PAYMENT that are left in our custody. which yours are inclusive
Besides, you were given a High bill to pay for your transfer paper
permit of your fund. in order to receive your PAYMENT of which we didnâ€™t
hear from you for some times now.Hence, AFRICAN UNION (AU) Head Office has
held meeting today been 8TH November 2023 with ( WESTERN UNION ) the
issue on the meeting is that they now offering a Special Christmas Bonus
to help all our customers that are abandoned their PAYMENT in our custody
due to the high price. in order words we are now requesting that
those involve should pay only the sum of $25.00 usd to receive all their
PAYMENT abandoned in our custody.
 You shall be Received $8,000 in every
two days, $4000 from western union while $4000 from western union after
3hours you pick up the first transfer making total $8,000 you shall pick
in each two days, Besides, my dear, this is the opportunity for you and
have to comply and your total funds of $1.8million shall be transfer to
your destination address before we go on Christmas holidays.
But note that after (November 8th) you did not make
the payment of $25.00 usd.then we will divert your funds to government
fund to avoid problem or we will cancel the payment because we are about
to enter into end of year Project, Note; That after the (  November 8th
till  ( November 9th ) We will enter end of year project for the year and
that is the reason we decided to help all our customers before we enter
the end of year project So be advised to send $25.00 usd. immediately if
you still willing to claim your payment so that we will register your
payment once we receive the transfer paper permit activation because you
will start receiving your payment from tomorrow morning by 10 am in
your Country time. $4000 from western union another second payment of
$4000.00 we be in afternoon by 3:30 PM making total of $8,000 you shall
pick at once,
After the payment of $25.00 usd. we will give the full information to pick
up your first/second payment of $8,000 through Any Branch Western Union In
your Country, Send the $45.00 usd through  money Gram
with the information below:
(YOU CAN SEND US AN ITUNES CARD, STEAM WALLET, EBAY CARD, SEPHORA CARD. FOOTLOCKER CARD, VANILLA CARD, AMEX CARD OR AMAZON CARD)
Receiver First Name :::::: David
Receiver Last Name :::Obu
Country:::::::: Benin Republic
City::::::: Cotonou
Amount::::: $25.00 usd
Test Question:::: Honest?
Test Answer:: Trust
Sender's Name::::??
Money Transfer Control Number:::??
Forward the payment mtcn number or Reference Number, and sender name and
address after sending the Money to enable us to pick up the money in this
Department office here. Note: that we do this to help all our customers so
don't delay because any delay will make us to cancel your payment or
divert payment to Government to avoid problem because we don't have such
time to delay anymore.
I am looking forward to receiving $25.00 usd. immediately to enable us to
give your the full information which you will use pick up your payment in
any western union but fall to do so you will lose your payment because
you have only today after that no more.
I wish you good luck and Merry Christmas in advance.
Yours in service
MR PETER CHALES
NEW HEAD OF DIRECTOR.
FOREIGN CONTRACTOR PAYMENT OFFICE
REPUBLIC OF BENIN
THIS IS OUR CONDUCT CODE ( X306)
CHRISTMAS BONANZA! TO YOU, HAPPY CHRISTMAS IN ADVANCE

subject: Re: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you keeping me updated about the payment that is still in your custody. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the transfer paper permit? What exactly is it for and why is there a high bill associated with it?

I'm also curious about the Special Christmas Bonus that you mentioned. How does it work and what are the benefits of availing it?

Lastly, could you clarify how the funds will be transferred to my address? Will it be through Western Union or another method?

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Tiffany
